q-import { q-components.qhtml } onReady { var host = this; if (!host || host.__qbuilderPageEditWired) { return; } host.__qbuilderPageEditWired = true; host.setAttribute("data-page-edit-mode", "0"); if (typeof host.qdom === "function") { var qdomHost = host.qdom(); if (qdomHost && typeof qdomHost.find === "function" && !qdomHost.find("q-builder[q-builder-runtime='1']")) { qdomHost.appendNode(qdomHost.createQComponentInstance("q-builder", { "q-builder-runtime": "1" })); } } } q-component nav-bar { w3-black,w3-center { w3-bar-item,w3-btn,w3-hover-grey { slot { nav-items } } } } q-template q-input-with-label { div { span.w3-label { slot { label } } slot { input-element } } } div.w3-black.w3-text-white.w3-bar, nav-bar { li { html { top-item 1 } } li { html { top-item 2 } } li { html { top-item 3 } } } div.w3-container.w3-title.w3-header.w3-xlarge.w3-green { html { Hello world } } div.w3-threequarter.w3-light-grey,q-tabs { id: "demo-tabs" q-tab.w3-light-grey { name { text { Sign-in } } content { div.w3-light-grey { h3 { text { Sign-in } } q-form { q-input-with-label { label { text { username } } input-element { q-input { name: "username" } } } q-input-with-label { label { text { password } } input-element { q-input { type: "password"; name: "password"; } } } q-input-with-label { label { text { Remember Me } } input-element { input { type: "checkbox"; name: "remember" text { Remember me } } } } center,q-input-with-label { label { } input-element { button.w3-btn { text { Submit } } } } } } } } q-tab { name { text { Details } } content { div.w3-light-grey { h3 { text { Details } } p { text { This is the second tab. } } } } } q-tab { name { text { Contact } } content { div { h3 { text { Contact } } p { text { This is the third tab. } } } } } } div.w3-quarter.w3-nav.w3-col.w3-right.w3-padding { ul.w3-list.w3-block { li.w3-bar.w3-green.w3-bar-item { html { navigation } } nav-bar { w3-bar { li { html { right-item 1 } } li { html { right-item 2 } } li { html { right-item 3 } } li.w3-button.w3-blue { text { Show Tab 2 } onclick { document.querySelector("#demo-tabs").show(1); } } li { id: "toggle-editor" data-page-edit-toggle: "1" class: q-bind { var mode = typeof getBuilderConfig === "function" ? String(getBuilderConfig("edit_mode") || "").trim() : "0"; return mode === "1" ? "w3-button w3-green" : "w3-button w3-orange"; } content: q-bind { var mode = typeof getBuilderConfig === "function" ? String(getBuilderConfig("edit_mode") || "").trim() : "0"; return mode === "1" ? "Edit Mode: ON" : "Edit Mode: OFF"; } onclick { var host = this.closest("q-html"); if (!host) { return; } var current = typeof getBuilderConfig === "function" ? String(getBuilderConfig("edit_mode") || "").trim() : "0"; var active = current === "1" ? "0" : "1"; if (typeof setBuilderConfig === "function") { setBuilderConfig("edit-mode", active); } host.setAttribute("data-page-edit-mode", active); if (typeof qbuilder !== "undefined" && qbuilder && typeof qbuilder.inspect === "function") { qbuilder.inspect(host, active === "1"); } if (typeof host.update === "function") { host.update(); } else if (typeof QHtml !== "undefined" && QHtml && typeof QHtml.updateQHtmlElement === "function") { QHtml.updateQHtmlElement(host); } } } } } } }
